name: The Komorebi Bed
description: Elevate your bedroom with the Modern Queen Bed, a masterpiece of clean lines and minimalist aesthetics. Crafted with durable wood and upholstered in high-quality fabric, it offers both comfort and style. Its neutral tones blend effortlessly into any décor, making it the perfect centerpiece for a restful retreat.

name: The Hikari Lounger
description: Designed for still afternoons and soft mornings, Hikari invites you to rest under the light. Its sturdy wooden base and plush cushions offer a timeless space for reflection, reading, or napping.

name: The Orlo Bed
description: Crafted from richly grained walnut, the Orlo Bed balances timeless warmth with hidden functionality. Its tapered legs and built-in storage bring practical beauty to modern bedrooms.

name: Saba Wabi bed
description: Inspired by the Japanese philosophy of wabi-sabi, the Saba Wabi Bed embraces simplicity and natural beauty. Its low-profile frame and earthy textures create a tranquil ambiance, turning any bedroom into a serene sanctuary.

name: The Liora Iron Bed
description:
The Liora Iron Bed blends the romance of vintage Europe with the strength of handcrafted iron.
With delicately curved scrollwork and a timeless matte black finish, it anchors your bedroom with quiet elegance. Designed to last for decades - and to be remembered.

name: The Palma Bed
description:
The Palma Bed invites rest with warmth and whimsy.
Its bold spherical legs echo mid-century optimism, while the walnut wood frame grounds the design in earthy calm. Each piece is handcrafted with intention, turning simplicity into sculpture. Made to be both slept in and admired.

name: The Sora Bed
description:
The Sora Bed balances modern calm with vintage warmth.
Crafted from solid oak and hand-woven cane, its rounded frame softens the space while offering tactile texture. Designed for restful interiors where simplicity and comfort coexist, it’s a quiet centerpiece for any serene bedroom.
